content: integrated with Db2 for z/OS. It delivers high-speed processing for complex Db2 queries to support business-critical reporting and analytic workloads. The accelerator transforms the mainframe into a hybrid transaction and analytic processing (HTAP) environment. For more information, see this IBM web page. Chapter 3. Central processor complex design 137  IBM Cloud Hyper Protect Data Base as a Service (DBaaS) for PostgreSQL or MongoDB offers enterprise cloud database environments with high availability for sensitive data workloads. For more information, see this IBM Cloud web page.  IBM Cloud Hyper Protect Crypto Services is a key management service and cloud hardware security module (HSM) that supports industry standards such as PKCS #11. For more information, see this IBM Cloud web page.  IBM Security® Guardium® Data Encryption (GDE) consists of a unified suite of products that are built on a common infrastructure.
